Description: JIRA Software is equipped with features that support every stage of your software development process to help you plan, track and report.
Name: JIRA

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Returns the details of a user - need to specify an Account ID.

Methods.Name: Search Users
Methods.Description: Allows you to search users.

Methods.Name: List Issues By Project
Methods.Description: Get a list of issues attached to a project.

Methods.Name: List Issues
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all issues.

Methods.Name: Transition Issue
Methods.Description: Performs the issue transition.

Methods.Name: Search Issues By JQL
Methods.Description: Search for issues with a user defined JQL string.

Methods.Name: Get Possible Transitions for Issue
Methods.Description: Returns a list of transitions available for this issue, for the current user.

Methods.Name: Create Issue
Methods.Description: Creates a new Issue.

Methods.Name: Delete Issue
Methods.Description: Deletes the specified issue.

Methods.Name: Update Issue
Methods.Description: Changes specific details of an Issue.

Methods.Name: Get Issue Types
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all issue types visible to the user.

Methods.Name: Get Issue
Methods.Description: Returns details of an issue for a given ID.

Methods.Name: Issue Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever an issue is created.

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Issues
Methods.Description: Gets all issues which have been created or updated since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get New Issues
Methods.Description: Gets all new issues since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Issues
Methods.Description: Gets all existing issues which have been updated since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Issue Updated Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever an issue is updated.

Methods.Name: Get Project Issue Types
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all issue types for a project that are visible to the user.

Methods.Name: Add Attachment
Methods.Description: Adds one or more attachments to an issue.

Methods.Name: Create Project
Methods.Description: Create a project in this JIRA account.

Methods.Name: List Projects
Methods.Description: Returns all projects which are visible for the currently logged in user. If no user is logged in, it returns the list of projects that are visible when using anonymous access.

Methods.Name: Add Comment
Methods.Description: Add a new comment to a specified issue.

Methods.Name: Comment Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever a comment is created.

Methods.Name: Update Comment
Methods.Description: Update a specified comment attached to an issue.

Methods.Name: Get Comment
Methods.Description: Returns a single comment attached to an issue.

Methods.Name: Comment Updated Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever a comment is updated.

Methods.Name: List Comments
Methods.Description: Returns all comments for an issue.

Methods.Name: Delete Comment
Methods.Description: Deletes specified comment attached to an issue.

Methods.Name: List Dasboards
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all Dashboards.

Methods.Name: Get Dashboard
Methods.Description: Returns details of the requested Dashboard.

Methods.Name: Get Issue Edit Metadata
Methods.Description: Returns meta data for the issue.

Methods.Name: Get Issue Create Metadata
Methods.Description: Returns the meta data for creating an issue.

Methods.Name: Sprint Updated Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever a sprint is updated.

Methods.Name: Sprint Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever a sprint is created.

Methods.Name: Board Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever a board is created.

Methods.Name: Get Board
Methods.Description: Returns the board for a specific ID.

Methods.Name: Board Updated Webhook
Methods.Description: Triggered whenever a board is updated.

Methods.Name: List Boards
Methods.Description: Returns all boards the user has permission to view.
